author: dblevins
msg: ADDED: -m option to the deploy tool
The -m option will move your jar from it�s current
location to the OPENEJB_HOME/beans directory.
ADDED: dir checking before updating config
Enhanced the deploy tool so that it will not update
your config if there is a <Deployments dir="foo" />
entry that would validly load the jar. For example, if
you deployed the jar C:\my\app\mybeans\myEjb.jar and you
already had the following line in your config file...
<Deployments dir="C:\my\app\mybeans" />
...then your would not be updated.
ADDED: paths resolved relative to OPENEJB_HOME
The deploy tool will now also resolve those paths
relative to the OPENEJB_HOME directory.  If your
OPENEJB_HOME variable was set to C:\openejb, for
example, the following line...
<Deployments dir="beans/" />
...would automatically be expanded to...
<Deployments dir="C:\openejb\beans\" />

author: dblevins
msg: Scripts weren't handling deploy parameters correctly.  Fixed now.
